Key Match Events: Blake Perkins robbed Noelvi Marte of a homer in the sixth inning
Jackson Chourio hit a go-ahead homer in the ninth
Devin Williams made a game-saving diving grab
Reds scored four runs off Frankie Montas
Spencer Steer had a two-run single
Amed Rosario tied the game with a 420-foot homer
Fernando Cruz and others combined to fan 14 Brewers
Post-Match Reflections: David Bell expressed frustration after the loss
Bell noted the Brewers' defensive plays and swings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was followed by a concert featuring Shaquille O'Neal
Brewers went 1-for-15 with runners in scoring position
